obatath dimenshiyawa wiya hakiyisakkobari da hamuduruwane me rate inna narakayo tika udurala danna?saradharma nathi ugathkamakin palak nahamukalangamuwa liyanagemulla suwisuddharama wiharastha siri gunalankara dahampasale mawupiya guna wandanawapuhudun bawehi warada kumak da?shri lanka amarapura maha sangha sabhawe sabhapathi padawi labathiwawanu bari thana rahase handuwa pera sansare asura mathak wikawi sankalpananawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawamage jiwithaye ekras kirim nahasakwithi rajasapa koyitharam uthumda ?mathale padiwita nikakotuwa susimarama wiharayaudarata rajadhaniya (1747 - 1762) palanaya kala kirthi shri rajasinha rajathuma wisin aarambha karana lada padiwita nikakotuwa susimarama wiharasthanaya mathale kumbaiyangoda nagaraye sita kilomitarayaka durin pihita athi uthum pujaniya sthanayaki.bawum sahitha bhumiyaka pihita athi wiharasthanayata wishala bim pramanayak uruma wi thibe.
